page.title: 19EVENTS
page.content: In the past few years a village fair has developed through the ideas of a travelling theatre company called "Diabalo"IT takes place during July. The fair originally called the "Dragon Fair"has a short play as a finale acted out by the theatre company,using large puppets made by local children in school and evening workshops held the proceeding week.All clubs and committees have stalls and fire eaters,jugglers and dancers entertain. this year the theme has been changed to a "Butterfly Fair." the same theatre group organise a bonfire celebration and again use large scale puppets to act out a story with a moral.Local children are also invited to help out in this. Both events are attended by two to three thousand people.
